name: Parachute Madness
description:
Web Demo Controls:
- Move the mouse to control the character sideways.
- Spacebar/Return/P: Pause the game.
(Works better on Mozilla)

"Beware everything that's on your way down!"

Parachute Madness is a retro-arcade game -currently- for Android. Tilt your device both sides to move your character and try to avoid the dangers that lie ahead! Play countless games, go for the highest score possible, unlock characters, equipments, challenges, and more in this free for everyone game!

Updates:
03/17/2016 - 1.0.1 Released - Minor graphic tweaks and bug fixes.
03/20/2016 - HTML Demo Released! Try out Parachute Madness on your web browser! (Mozilla is recommended)

Contact:

Parachute Madness is a game developed by FATE Game Studios.
